name: @graffiticode/mcp
description: MCP server for Graffiticode - multi-language DSL platform

scripts.gcp:build: gcloud builds submit --config cloudbuild.yaml --substitutions=COMMIT_SHA=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'latest')
scripts.gcp:deploy: gcloud run deploy mcp --source . --port 3001 --region us-central1 --platform managed --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.gcp:logs: gcloud run logs read mcp --region us-central1

author: Graffiticode
